channel.title: Streets of Rage Remake released
channel.description:
[url]https://www.bombergames.net/sorr_project/[/url]
Download it for great justice! The remake includes all of the original 3 games as well as alternate routes and new stages, new weapons, gore, better visual effects, online/lan multiplayer, bots, modding, remixed soundtrack, tons of unlockables and other shit. And if you didn't like Streets of Rage then you're a drain on society.

item.title: Streets of Rage Remake released
item.dc:creator: Grief_Reaper
item.description:
I remember playing this way back. Me and a friend could never get past this boss that comes down from an elevator. SOR2 ftw…
